entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You delivered the second radio to camp gamma.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find the next camp using an approximate location. You'll probably have to search the surrounding area around the waypoint before delivering the radio.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] Looks like I was wrong again. You should search the immediate area. Put a waypoint down if you think you'll get lost.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: There should be someone in charge. Find that person and deliver the radio.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] Great job! Come back to my location and I'll give you the rest of the radios.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Zeb Maris and get the other radios.
